name: AppleCore + Disruption Psych engine for mac
name_original: AppleCore + Disruption Psych engine for mac
description:
This project was made in around 1.5 days for the Game Dev Club's first game jam.

The developers are Paul Narchal, Florian Chanson and Alec Ferrari.

Sadly because of poor timing and organisation, the project didn't turn out as we expected.

The theme was "You are the villain".  We had the Crank diversifier. This meant that you had to take damage from stopping movement. 

We had the idea of an evil scientist that tried to create a WMD and have it backfire.You play as the scientist that tries to test his weapon. Use WASD to move around and activate the test. Once the test is launched, you have to avoid the myriad of lasers coming down on you. Don't stop moving or you'll die! Try to survive as long as you can!
